DOC.brief_summary: The project consist qualitative interview member obesity team ( endocrinologist , bariatric surgeon , dietician , psychologist , .. ) different Flemish hospital . These interview aim gain insight current practice counseling patient bariatric surgery , focus medication counseling . This make possible assess strength weaknesses current practice obese patient undergo undergone bariatric surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Multidisciplinary Approach Counseling Obese Patient Before After Bariatric Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The project consist qualitative interview member obesity team ( endocrinologist , bariatric surgeon , dietician , psychologist , .. ) different Flemish hospital . These interview aim gain insight current practice counseling patient bariatric surgery , focus medication counsel . We benchmarking also qualitative analysis interview use Nvivo 10 . This make possible assess strength weaknesses current practice obese patient undergo undergone bariatric surgery .
DOC.criteria: All member obesity team prepare participate study
